tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE goods_movement (
  movement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Goods (
    goods_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goods_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    location_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES LocationData(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MovementHistory (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    goods_id INT NOT NULL,
    from_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    to_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    movement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goods_id) REFERENCES Goods(goods_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (from_location_id) REFERENCES LocationData(location_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (to_location_id) REFERENCES LocationData(location_id)
);
